alert.note: Alert for Osage; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 8:36AM CDT until May 26 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek at Avant affecting Osage County. Bird Creek near Sperry affecting Osage and Tulsa Counties. Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bird Creek near Sperry. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, minor rural flooding occurs from Skiatook to Turley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 22.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
